snippet: As President Obama considers his options, he has struck just the right cautious note so far.
abstract: Editorial praises Pres Obama's cautious response to Sunni extremist militants seizing territory and threatening existence of Iraq; contends his opening to Iran has been the most controversial move, yet it is potentially his most important; maintains that if Obama decides to take military action, he must make clear it is to disrupt momentum of militants aligned with Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama considers his options, he has struck just the right cautious note so far.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
